test_cases.test_name: Proprietary Transformer Model Molecule Generation Test
test_cases.objective: Verify that the proprietary transformer models correctly generate molecules with valid chemical structures and desired properties.
prerequisites: Sample input dataset for molecule generation

test_steps.action: Load the proprietary transformer model into the AI platform.
test_steps.expected_result: Model loads successfully without errors.

test_steps.action: Input a seed molecule and generate 100 candidate molecules.
test_steps.expected_result: System generates 100 valid molecules with correct SMILES notation.

test_steps.action: Validate generated molecules using a chemical structure validator.
test_steps.expected_result: All generated molecules pass chemical structure validation.

acceptance_criteria: All generated molecules are chemically valid.
Generation completes within expected time frame (≤ 5 minutes).
regulatory_basis: URS-029-001: Implement proprietary transformer models for molecule generation.
URS-029-007: Maintain data integrity per ALCOA+ for training datasets and outputs.
data_integrity_requirements: All generated molecules must be traceable to the input seed.
Model version and parameters must be logged.

test_cases.test_name: Multi-Parameter Optimization Pipeline Test
test_cases.objective: Validate that the system can optimize molecules against multiple parameters (potency, selectivity, PK, tox) within the required time frame.

test_steps.action: Configure optimization parameters for potency, selectivity, PK, and tox.
test_steps.expected_result: Parameters are set successfully with no configuration errors.

test_steps.action: Run optimization pipeline on the sample dataset.
test_steps.expected_result: Pipeline completes optimization within 4 hours.

test_steps.action: Review optimized molecules and their scores.
test_steps.expected_result: Optimized molecules meet predefined score thresholds for all parameters.

acceptance_criteria: Pipeline completes within 4 hours as specified in URS-029-011.
Optimized molecules meet or exceed score thresholds for all parameters.
regulatory_basis: URS-029-004: Support multi-parameter optimization (potency, selectivity, PK, tox).
URS-029-011: End-to-end pipeline completion < 4 hours per target.
data_integrity_requirements: All optimization steps must be logged with timestamps.
Input and output molecules must be traceable.

test_cases.test_name: Proprietary Transformer Model Molecule Generation Validation
test_cases.objective: To verify that the proprietary transformer models correctly generate molecules as per the specified requirements.

test_steps.action: Configure the proprietary transformer model with predefined parameters.
test_steps.expected_result: Model configuration completes without errors.

test_steps.action: Execute the molecule generation process.
test_steps.expected_result: Molecules are generated according to the predefined parameters.

acceptance_criteria: Molecules generated match the predefined parameters
Execution time is within acceptable limits
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all generated molecules are traceable and verifiable

test_cases.test_name: Physics-Informed Simulations Integration Test
test_cases.objective: To ensure the physics-informed simulations are correctly integrated for docking and dynamics.

test_steps.action: Configure the physics-informed simulations with predefined parameters.
test_steps.expected_result: Simulation configuration completes without errors.

test_steps.action: Execute the docking and dynamics simulations.
test_steps.expected_result: Simulations complete successfully and produce valid results.

acceptance_criteria: Simulation results are valid and match predefined parameters
Execution time is within acceptable limits
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all simulation results are traceable and verifiable

test_steps.action: Execute the molecule generation process.

test_cases.test_name: Integration with ELN and LIMS Systems
test_cases.objective: To ensure seamless integration between the AI platform and ELN/LIMS systems for data exchange.
prerequisites: Access to ELN and LIMS systems

test_steps.action: Configure the AI platform to connect with ELN and LIMS systems.
test_steps.expected_result: Connection established successfully.

test_steps.action: Perform data exchange between the AI platform and ELN/LIMS systems.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is exchanged accurately and completely.

acceptance_criteria: Data exchange is accurate and complete
No data loss or corruption
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity during exchange
Maintain audit trails

test_cases.test_name: Proprietary Transformer Model Molecule Generation Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify the implementation of proprietary transformer models for molecule generation as specified in URS-029-001.

test_steps.action: Initiate molecule generation process using the transformer model.
test_steps.expected_result: Model generates molecules without errors.

acceptance_criteria: Model generates at least 10k candidate molecules/day as per URS-029-010.
regulatory_basis: URS-029-007: Maintain data integrity per ALCOA+ for training datasets and outputs.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all generated molecules are traceable and logged.

test_cases.test_name: Integration with ELN and LIMS Systems
test_cases.objective: Ensure the AI platform integrates seamlessly with ELN and LIMS systems as per URS-029-012.
prerequisites: Access to ELN and LIMS systems

test_steps.action: Send a test molecule data from AI platform to ELN.
test_steps.expected_result: Data appears in ELN without discrepancies.

acceptance_criteria: Data integrity maintained during transfer as per ALCOA+.
regulatory_basis: URS-029-007: Maintain data integrity per ALCOA+ for training datasets and outputs.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data consistency between systems.

test_cases.test_name: Multi-Parameter Optimization Performance Test
test_cases.objective: Verify the system can perform multi-parameter optimization (potency, selectivity, PK, tox) within the required time frame.
prerequisites: Test dataset with known parameters available

test_steps.action: Load the test dataset into the system and configure the optimization parameters.
test_steps.expected_result: Dataset is loaded successfully and parameters are configured without errors.

test_steps.action: Execute the multi-parameter optimization process.
test_steps.expected_result: Optimization completes within 4 hours per target as specified in URS-029-011.

test_steps.action: Verify the results meet the predefined criteria for potency, selectivity, PK, and tox.
test_steps.expected_result: Results are within acceptable ranges for all parameters.

acceptance_criteria: Optimization completes within 4 hours per target.
Results meet all predefined parameter criteria.
regulatory_basis: URS-029-004: Support multi-parameter optimization (potency, selectivity, PK, tox).
URS-029-011: End-to-end pipeline completion < 4 hours per target.
data_integrity_requirements: All optimization parameters and results must be traceable and unaltered.
Provenance of generated molecules must be retained.

test_cases.test_name: Integration with ELN and LIMS Systems
test_cases.objective: Validate the seamless integration between the AI platform and ELN/LIMS systems for data exchange.
prerequisites: ELN and LIMS systems available and accessible

test_steps.action: Configure the AI platform to connect with the ELN and LIMS systems.
test_steps.expected_result: Connection is established without errors.

test_steps.action: Send a test dataset from the AI platform to the ELN system.
test_steps.expected_result: Dataset is successfully transferred and visible in the ELN system.

test_steps.action: Retrieve experimental results from the LIMS system and verify integration.
test_steps.expected_result: Results are successfully retrieved and processed by the AI platform.

acceptance_criteria: Data transfer between systems is successful and accurate.
All integrated systems maintain data integrity and traceability.
regulatory_basis: URS-029-012: Integrate with ELN, LIMS, and compound registration systems.
URS-029-007: Maintain data integrity per ALCOA+ for training datasets and outputs.
data_integrity_requirements: All transferred data must be complete, accurate, and unaltered.
Provenance of data must be maintained throughout the integration process.

test_cases.test_name: Multi-Parameter Optimization Validation
test_cases.objective: Verify the system's ability to optimize molecules across multiple parameters (potency, selectivity, PK, tox) simultaneously.

test_steps.action: Configure optimization parameters for potency, selectivity, PK, and tox.
test_steps.expected_result: System accepts all parameters without errors.

test_steps.action: Initiate multi-parameter optimization run with test dataset.
test_steps.expected_result: System completes optimization within expected timeframe.

test_steps.action: Review generated molecules against optimization criteria.
test_steps.expected_result: Molecules meet all specified optimization criteria.

acceptance_criteria: System successfully optimizes molecules across all specified parameters
Optimization completes within 4 hours
Generated molecules meet all optimization criteria
data_integrity_requirements: All optimization parameters must be traceable
Generated molecules must have complete provenance

test_cases.test_name: HPC/Cloud Autoscaling Verification
test_cases.objective: Validate the system's ability to automatically scale computational resources in HPC/Cloud environment.

test_steps.action: Configure monitoring for resource utilization and scaling events.
test_steps.expected_result: All monitoring tools are active and collecting data.

test_steps.action: Initiate batch processing of 10,000 molecules.
test_steps.expected_result: System automatically scales up resources as load increases.

test_steps.action: Monitor system during processing completion.
test_steps.expected_result: System scales down resources after processing completes.

acceptance_criteria: System scales up within 5 minutes of increased load
All 10,000 molecules processed within 4 hours
System scales down within 15 minutes of load reduction
data_integrity_requirements: All scaling events must be logged
Processing results must be complete and accurate

test_cases.test_name: Multi-Parameter Optimization Performance Test
test_cases.objective: Verify the system can optimize molecules against multiple parameters (potency, selectivity, PK, tox) within the required timeframe.
prerequisites: Test dataset with known parameters available

test_steps.action: Load test dataset into the system for multi-parameter optimization.
test_steps.expected_result: Dataset is successfully loaded and parameters are recognized.

test_steps.action: Initiate multi-parameter optimization process with predefined constraints.
test_steps.expected_result: Optimization process starts without errors and progresses as expected.

test_steps.action: Monitor and record the time taken to complete the optimization process.
test_steps.expected_result: Optimization completes within 4 hours per target as specified in URS-029-011.

acceptance_criteria: Optimization process completes within 4 hours per target.
Generated molecules meet predefined parameter constraints.
data_integrity_requirements: All optimization results must be traceable and unaltered.
Provenance of generated molecules must be retained.

test_cases.test_name: Integration with ELN and LIMS Systems
test_cases.objective: Validate the seamless integration of the AI platform with ELN and LIMS systems for data exchange and feedback loops.
prerequisites: ELN and LIMS systems available and accessible

test_steps.action: Configure the AI platform to connect with ELN and LIMS systems using provided APIs.
test_steps.expected_result: Connection is established without errors and systems are recognized.

test_steps.action: Send test data from the AI platform to ELN and LIMS systems.
test_steps.expected_result: Data is successfully transmitted and appears correctly in ELN and LIMS.

test_steps.action: Retrieve feedback data from ELN and LIMS systems to the AI platform.
test_steps.expected_result: Feedback data is successfully received and processed by the AI platform.

acceptance_criteria: Data exchange between systems is accurate and complete.
Feedback loops are functional and data integrity is maintained.
data_integrity_requirements: All exchanged data must be traceable and unaltered.
Provenance of feedback data must be retained.

test_cases.test_name: Multi-parameter Optimization Performance Test
test_cases.objective: Verify the system can optimize molecules across potency, selectivity, PK, and tox parameters within specified timeframes.

test_steps.action: Configure optimization parameters for potency, selectivity, PK, and tox thresholds
test_steps.expected_result: System accepts all parameter thresholds and constraints

test_steps.action: Execute multi-parameter optimization run for target
test_steps.expected_result: Optimization completes within 4 hours with valid output molecules

acceptance_criteria: Optimization completes within 4 hours
Output molecules meet all specified parameter thresholds
System maintains traceability of optimization decisions
data_integrity_requirements: ALCOA+ compliance for optimization parameters
Audit trail of all parameter adjustments

test_cases.test_name: Active Learning Loop Integration Test
test_cases.objective: Validate the system correctly incorporates ELN feedback into active learning cycles for model improvement.

test_steps.action: Submit experimental results from ELN for 10 compounds
test_steps.expected_result: System acknowledges receipt of experimental data

test_steps.action: Trigger active learning cycle incorporating new data
test_steps.expected_result: System generates updated model with improved predictions

acceptance_criteria: Experimental data is correctly ingested from ELN
Active learning cycle completes successfully
Model performance improves with new data
data_integrity_requirements: Chain of custody for experimental data
Model version control documentation

test_cases.test_name: Integration with ELN System Verification
test_cases.objective: Verify the seamless integration of the Novel Drug Discovery AI System with the Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) system to ensure data flow and feedback loops are functioning correctly.

test_steps.action: Log into the AI platform and initiate a molecule generation process.
test_steps.expected_result: Molecule generation process starts successfully.

test_steps.action: Check the ELN system for the generated molecules and feedback data.
test_steps.expected_result: Generated molecules and feedback data are visible in the ELN system.

acceptance_criteria: All generated molecules are correctly logged in the ELN system.
Feedback data is accurately reflected in the AI platform.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all data entries are timestamped and traceable.
Verify data consistency between AI platform and ELN system.

test_cases.test_name: Multi-Parameter Optimization Performance Test

test_steps.action: Load the test target dataset into the AI platform.
test_steps.expected_result: Dataset is successfully loaded and ready for optimization.

test_steps.action: Initiate the multi-parameter optimization process.
test_steps.expected_result: Optimization process starts successfully.

test_steps.action: Monitor the optimization process and record completion time.
test_steps.expected_result: Optimization process completes within 4 hours.

acceptance_criteria: Optimization process completes within the specified time frame.
Optimized molecules meet predefined criteria for potency, selectivity, PK, and toxicity.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all optimization parameters are logged and traceable.
Verify the accuracy of optimization results.

test_cases.test_name: Integration with ELN for Active Learning Feedback

test_steps.expected_result: Test data received and processed by the system.

test_steps.expected_result: Models updated successfully and feedback incorporated into active learning loops.

ELN feedback processed and incorporated into active learning loops.

test_steps.expected_result: Model generates a set of candidate molecules.

acceptance_criteria: Model generates at least 10k candidate molecules/day
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity per ALCOA+ for training datasets and outputs

test_cases.test_name: End-to-End Pipeline Completion Time Test
test_cases.objective: Validate the end-to-end pipeline completion time is less than 4 hours per target as per URS-029-011.

test_steps.action: Run the end-to-end pipeline for a specified target.
test_steps.expected_result: Pipeline completes processing within 4 hours.

acceptance_criteria: Pipeline completes within 4 hours
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure data integrity per ALCOA+ for training datasets and outputs

test_cases.test_name: Multi-parameter Optimization Performance Validation
test_cases.objective: Verify the system can optimize molecules against multiple parameters (potency, selectivity, PK, tox) within specified timeframes.
prerequisites: Test dataset with known parameters loaded

test_steps.action: Configure optimization job with 5 simultaneous parameters and constraints
test_steps.expected_result: System accepts configuration without errors

test_steps.action: Execute optimization run with 100 seed molecules
test_steps.expected_result: Completed run within 2 hours with valid Pareto front

acceptance_criteria: Optimization completes within 4 hours
At least 50 viable candidates generated
All parameters properly weighted in results
data_integrity_requirements: ALCOA+ compliance for all optimization inputs/outputs
Full traceability of parameter weights

test_cases.test_name: Model Versioning and Change Control Verification
test_cases.objective: Validate proper version control and approval workflows for proprietary AI model updates.

test_steps.action: Submit new model version through approval workflow
test_steps.expected_result: System enforces required approval steps before activation

test_steps.action: Attempt to use unapproved model in production pipeline
test_steps.expected_result: System prevents execution with proper audit trail

acceptance_criteria: All model changes require documented approval
Production system only uses approved versions
Full audit trail maintained for 10 years
data_integrity_requirements: Immutable model version records
Cryptographic signing of approved models
